thread.title: Allison Sanders

author: Allison Sanders
title: Allison Sanders
text: Totally amazing. I ordered a set of square business cards, just at their bare minimum offering, and I was blown away. Such quality! Extremely sturdy cards, such a fun and different shape, and I took advantage of their printfinity. I had no idea I could print so many different images on the back of my cards to create SETS. Amazing! My mind is spinning with the possibilities, especially as an application to their other product offerings. Such an exciting company to work with! I will be returning again and again and again. :)
